宧字的基本解释

宧
yí
屋子里的东北角。
养育：“东北者阳气始起，养育万物，故曰宧。”

宧字的汉语字典释义

[①]［yí］
［《廣韻》與之切，平之，以。］
(1)古称室内的东北角为宧。
(2)引申谓隐奥。参见“宧穾”、“宧奥”。
(3)同“頤”。养育。

宧字的康熙字典解释

【寅集上】【宀字部】　宧； 康熙笔画：9； 页码：页285第05
【唐韻】與之切【集韻】【韻會】盈之切【正韻】延知切，?音怡。【說文】養也，室之東北隅，食所居。【爾雅·釋宮】室東北隅謂之宧。【李巡曰】東北，陽氣始起，育養萬物，故曰宧。宧者，養也。又曰日光所漏入處。孫氏云：日側之明，是宧明也。

暂无。

Confession
Basic explanation of words
Confession
yí
The northeast corner of the house.
Nurturing: "The yang energy of the northeast begins to nurture all things, so it is called 宧."
Confession
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［yí］
["Guangyun" cut with it, flat it, with. ]
(1) The northeast corner of the room was called 宧 in ancient times.
(2) By extension, it is called Yinao. See "宧穾", "宧奥".
(3) Same as "Yi". Nurture.
Confession
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
【The first chapter of Yinji】【The Department of the Characters of the 宀】　宧; Kangxi strokes: 9; Page number: page 285 05
[Tang Yun] Cut with it [Jiyun] [Yunhui] Yingzhiqi [Zhengyun] Yanzhi cut,? Yinyi. [Said the text] Yang Ye, the northeast corner of the room, where the food resides. 【Erya·Shigong】The northeast corner of the room is called the confession. [Li Xun said] In the northeast, Yang Qi begins to nurture all things, so it is called 宧. Husband, raise also. Said the place where sunlight leaked into. Sun Shiyun: The light on the side of the sun is the Ming Ming.
